chairperson.name: Louise Putt
chairperson.bio: Louise has been serving as Chairperson of the Coronation Gardens Residents Society, bringing extensive experience in community leadership and a deep commitment to fostering a harmonious living environment for all residents.

members.name: Committee Member 1
members.bio: Responsible for managing the society's finances and ensuring transparent financial reporting to all residents.

members.name: Committee Member 2
members.bio: Handles correspondence, meeting minutes, and maintains official records of the society.

members.name: Committee Member 3
members.bio: Oversees maintenance requests and coordinates with service providers to ensure the development remains in excellent condition.
